p: We included the patients transplanted from May 1985 to November 2015. During this period, there were 1334 kidney transplantations in our center, the António Pina Renal Transplant Unit. Those with a positive HCV RNA for more than 6 months were considered “HCV infected.” Although the study was started in 1985, the qualitative research of HCV started on 1995 and the viral load was determined in 1997.
